name: ext_R5_ImplementationGuide_definition
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ImplementationGuide.definition for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ImplementationGuide.definition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Information needed to build the IG
element.definition: The information needed by an IG publisher tool to publish the whole implementation guide.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.

element.short: Grouping used to present related resources in the IG
element.definition: A logical group of resources. Logical groups can be used when building pages.

element.short: Information needed to build the IG
element.definition: The information needed by an IG publisher tool to publish the whole implementation guide.

element.short: Grouping used to present related resources in the IG
element.definition: A logical group of resources. Logical groups can be used when building pages.
The human-readable title to display for the package of resources when rendering the implementation guide.
The human-readable title to display for the package of resources when rendering the implementation guide.

element.short: Human readable text describing the package
Human readable text describing the package

element.definition: A resource that is part of the implementation guide. Conformance resources (value set, structure definition, capability statements etc.) are obvious candidates for inclusion, but any kind of resource can be included as an example resource.
Where this resource is found.
Where this resource is found.

element.short: Versions this applies to (if different to IG)
element.definition: Indicates the FHIR Version(s) this artifact is intended to apply to. If no versions are specified, the resource is assumed to apply to all the versions stated in ImplementationGuide.fhirVersion.

element.short: Versions this applies to (if different to IG)
element.definition: Indicates the FHIR Version(s) this artifact is intended to apply to. If no versions are specified, the resource is assumed to apply to all the versions stated in ImplementationGuide.fhirVersion.

element.short: Human readable name for the resource
element.definition: A human assigned name for the resource. All resources SHOULD have a name, but the name may be extracted from the resource (e.g. ValueSet.name).

element.short: Human readable name for the resource
element.definition: A human assigned name for the resource. All resources SHOULD have a name, but the name may be extracted from the resource (e.g. ValueSet.name).

A description of the reason that a resource has been included in the implementation guide.

If true, indicates the resource is an example instance.

element.definition: Data type name for ImplementationGuide.definition.page.source[x] from FHIR R5

element.definition: Data type name for ImplementationGuide.definition.page.name from FHIR R5
